DOC.brief_title: Effect Fish Oil Enriched In Omega-11 Fatty Acid On Lipoprotein Metabolism In Adults
DOC.detailed_description: Serum cholesterol transport lipoprotein , VLDL , LDL HDL , vary relationship cardiovascular disease risk . LDL , example , proatherogenic , whereas HDL cardio-protective . Long-chain monounsaturated fatty acid ( LCMUFA ) , fatty acid 18 carbon length single double bound , show mouse decrease proatherogenic lipoprotein , LDL , reduce atherosclerosis . This study test hypothesis LCMUFA supplementation human favorably alter lipoprotein lipid profile regard cardiovascular disease risk . In addition , ass parameter related lipoprotein composition function , well biomarkers related coagulation inflammation , previously show affected supplementation omega-3 fatty acid . This clinical research project design pilot , randomize , double-blinded , crossover study investigate effect fish oil enrich LCMUFA lipoprotein metabolism . Subjects receive control fish oil enrich oleic acid , monounsaturated fatty acid ( C18:1 ) , fish oil supplement produce Saury fish ( rich LCMUFA ) approximately 8-10 week , wash period 8-10 week two arm study . The study consist 4 outpatient visit laboratory research sample CAVI test perform . A 7-day food diary , pill count , red cell membrane fatty acid level monitor assess compliance .
DOC.criteria: INCLUSION CRITERIA : Male female participant 18 year age . Subject must healthy , known history cardiovascular disease . Premenopausal woman childbearing potential must nonlactating use effective form birth control course study . Subject understands protocol provide write , informed consent addition willingness comply specify followup evaluation . EXCLUSION CRITERIA : Pregnancy , plan pregnancy ( within study period ) woman currently breastfeed . Subjects weight change great 20 % past 3 month . Subjects plan significant change diet exercise level . Subjects already consume 1.5 g per day EPA/DHA form . Known sensitivity allergy fish , shellfish omega3 fatty acid supplement Subjects know bleed disorder ( example , Hemophilia ) Subjects previously diagnose atrial fibrillation Subjects clinically diagnose hepatic disease ( include limited auto immune disease , hepatitis cirrhosis ) Subjects chronic diarrhea , gastric bypass lapband procedure , ostomy , bowel motility problem , condition could affect intestinal fat absorption Subjects acute lifethreatening condition , prior sudden cardiac arrest , acute myocardial infarction ( last three month ) , stroke , embolism Liver enzymes ( AST ALT ) level 3x upper limit normal Subjects TSH great 1.5xULN clinical evidence hypo hyperthyroidism Subjects take supplement medication affect lipoproteins least past 8 week , fish oil supplement , bileacid sequestrants , plant sterol supplement , fibrates , statin Niacin . Subjects take daily aspirin antiplatelet anticoagulant agent ( Plavix ) . Subjects treat tamoxifen , estrogens , progestins stable > 4 week .
